participant_1.name: Erik
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and nostalgic, loves to share stories from his travels.
participant_1.background: I'm from Scandinavia, where my Viking ancestors are from. I am doing financial business now. I am a businessman. I'm going to listen to my Ween album and savor the memory of seeing them live in concert. I'm not rich but I do have a lot of pictures and stories to share from my travels.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and social media savvy, enjoys casual entertainment and adventures.
participant_2.background: I live with my pug and watch CSI to relax. It's important for my Instagram posts to look like I'm having fun. I want to learn how to fly an airplane. I like to eat at the diner down the street because it reminds me of my childhood. I like watching UFC fights.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Not much, just relaxing and watching CSI.
I'm listening to Ween and thinking about all the great concerts I've been to.
Nice! I love Ween, and I really want to see them live!
They're so good! You should definitely go see them if you get the chance.
I definitely will! Where are you from?
I'm from Scandinavia, where my Viking ancestors are from.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to visit Scandinavia.
You should! It's a beautiful place.
I'm sure it is! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to travel, read, and play video games.
Those are all great things to do! I like to travel, watch TV, and play video games too.
Nice! What's your favorite TV show?
I like CSI, it's so suspenseful!
I know, right? It's one of my favorites too.
What's your favorite video game?
I like a lot of different video games, but my favorite is probably The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
Oh, that's a good one! I've heard a lot of good things about it.
It's a really great game. You should check it out if you get the chance.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome!
